headline: AMETEK Appoints William P. Callahan Vice President and General Manager, Aerospace & Defense Division
summary: AMETEK, Inc. (NYSE: AME) today announced the appointment of William P. Callahan as Vice President and General Manager, Aerospace & Defense Division.

raw.headline: AMETEK Appoints William P. Callahan Vice President and General Manager, Aerospace & Defense Division

headline: AMETEK Increases Quarterly Dividend and Announces $1.25 Billion Share Repurchase Authorization
summary: AMETEK, Inc. (NYSE: AME) today announced its Board of Directors has approved an 11% increase in its quarterly cash dividend on common stock to $0.31 per share from $0.28 per share. The dividend is payable on March 31, 2025, to shareholders of record as of March 14, 2025. This dividend increase will raise the indicated annual rate to $1.24 per share.
